text: I m not that scared of death because I ve already expirienced it and so have you When I say death I don t mean the act of dying  I mean the state of being dead  or better described  the state of not existing Think back on your memories  keep going further into your past  The future you go  the more faded and murky your memories seem until eventually they just stop  You get to the point before you were born  That is what being dead feels like It s not dark  lonely  sad  or anything negative  It s just nothing  and I m fine with that   Trying to imagine being dead is like trying to see what s in the back of your head outside your peripheral vision Idk  I ve wrestled with the idea of death alot and I ve gotten to a point where it doesn t bother me
